tutorials.title: Get Started with CryoSPARC: Introductory Tutorial
tutorials.description: An introduction to processing data in CryoSPARC.

tutorials.title: Tutorial Videos: Single Particle Analysis with CryoSPARC
tutorials.description: Six videos covering cryo-EM fundamentals, a standard workflow, handling symmetry, discrete and continuous heterogeneity.

tutorials.title: Case Study: End-to-end exploratory processing of a motor-bound nucleosome (EMPIAR-10739)
tutorials.description: Handling global pseudosymmetry, using 3DVA to guide classification strategies, separating low population classes, and local refinement of a flexible region.

tutorials.title: Case Study: End-to-end processing of a ligand-bound GPCR (EMPIAR-10853)
tutorials.description: Micrograph Denoising, Junk Detection, Subset Particles by Statistic, Local Refinement and focussed 3D Classification to improve ligand density.

tutorials.title: Case Study: Discrete and Continuous Heterogeneity in FaNaC1 (EMPIAR-11631 and -11632)
tutorials.description: Processing a combined dataset of an ion channel with a focus on techniques for separating conformational states from a heterogeneous mixture.

tutorials.title: Case Study: Pseudosymmetry in TRPV5 and Calmodulin (EMPIAR-10256)
tutorials.description: Focus on handling pseudosymmetry and 3D Classification parameter choices.

tutorials.title: Case Study: End-to-end processing of an inactive GPCR (EMPIAR-10668)
tutorials.description: Local Refinement, 3D Variability Analysis, 3D Flex and classification of continuous heterogeneity.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Common CryoSPARC Plots
tutorials.description: Detailed explanation of plots produced in 2D Classification and 3D reconstruction and refinement jobs.

tutorials.title: CryoSPARC Live: New Session Start to Finish Guide
tutorials.description: End-to-end workflow for using CryoSPARC Live.
